renderedFields.description:
Description:
Application URL: http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login

 

Steps:

  1. Navigate to http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login
  2. Enter Email Address: tech.madvika@gmail.com
  3. Enter password: Welcome!
  4. Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn)
  5. verify the Total tasks in the dashboard

Expected: Total tasks is showing 0
Actual: Total tasks must display the correct count of tasks

content.text: verify the Total tasks in the dashboard
Actual: Total tasks must display the correct  count of tasks

fields.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks

parsed_issue.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks
parsed_issue.description:
Description: 
 Application URL:      Steps: • Navigate to  •   
 • Enter Email Address:  • tech.madvika@gmail.com 
 • Enter password: Welcome! 
 • Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn) 
 • verify the Total tasks in the dashboard 
 Expected: Total tasks is showing 0 
 Actual: Total tasks must display the correct  count of tasks
reproduction_steps: Step 2: Enter Email Address: tech.madvika@gmail.com in the Email Address field
Step 3: Enter password: Welcome! in the password field
Step 4: Click on the 'Sign in' button with the CSS selector #login-btn
Step 5: Verify the Total tasks in the dashboard
parsed_issue.expected_behavior: The Total tasks should display the correct count of tasks
parsed_issue.actual_behavior: The Total tasks is showing 0, which is incorrect

reproduction_steps.description: Enter email address in the login form
reproduction_steps.expected_result: Email field is filled with tech.madvika@gmail.com
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["#email", "#username", "#user", "#login-email", "input[name='email']", "input[name='username']", "input[name='user']", "input[type='email']", "input[placeholder*='email' i]", "input[placeholder*='username' i]", ".email-input", ".login-email", "input[aria-label*='email' i]", "input[data-testid='email']"], "value": "tech.madvika@gmail.com", "wait_condition": "input is visible and enabled", "validation": "", "screenshot": true}

reproduction_steps.description: Enter password in the login form
reproduction_steps.expected_result: Password field is filled with Welcome!
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["#password", "#pass", "#login-password", "input[name='password']", "input[name='pass']", "input[type='password']", "input[placeholder*='password' i]", ".password-input", ".login-password", "input[aria-label*='password' i]", "input[data-testid='password']"], "value": "Welcome!", "wait_condition": "input is visible and enabled", "validation": "", "screenshot": true}

{"selectors": ["#login-btn", "#submit-login", "#sign-in-button", "button[type='submit']", "button[aria-label*='login']", "input[type='submit']", "button[name='login']", "button[data-testid='login-button']", "button[aria-label*='sign in']", "button[aria-label*='submit']", "button[aria-label*='login']"], "value": "#login-btn", "wait_condition": "button is visible and enabled", "validation": "", "screenshot": true}

reproduction_steps.description: Verify the Total tasks in the dashboard
reproduction_steps.expected_result: Total tasks should display the correct count of tasks
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["#total-tasks", ".dashboard-tasks-count", ".task-count", "span[data-testid='total-tasks']", "div[aria-label*='Total tasks']", "div[data-testid='task-count']", "div[class*='task-count']"], "value": "Correct count of tasks", "wait_condition": "Total tasks element is visible", "validation": "", "screenshot": true}

reproduction_plan.expected_outcome: The Total tasks should display the correct count of tasks

executed_steps.error: Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'

executed_steps.description: Enter email address in the login form
executed_steps.expected_result: Email field is filled with tech.madvika@gmail.com
executed_steps.error: Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'

executed_steps.description: Enter password in the login form
executed_steps.expected_result: Password field is filled with Welcome!
executed_steps.error: Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'
Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'

executed_steps.description: Verify the Total tasks in the dashboard
executed_steps.expected_result: Total tasks should display the correct count of tasks
executed_steps.error: Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'

reproduction_result.root_cause_analysis: The bug was not successfully reproduced due to a consistent automation error across all steps. The error message 'Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'' suggests that there is an issue with the automation script, specifically with the methods used to interact with the browser elements. This error prevented the automation from completing any of the steps, including verifying the total tasks count.
recommendations: Investigate and fix the automation script to ensure that the 'ReproductionStep' object has the necessary attributes and methods to interact with browser elements.
Re-run the automation script after fixing the identified issues to verify if the bug can be successfully reproduced and to check if the total tasks count is displayed correctly.

The bug was not successfully reproduced due to a consistent automation error across all steps. The error message 'Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'' suggests that there is an issue with the automation script, specifically with the methods used to interact with the browser elements. This error prevented the automation from completing any of the steps, including verifying the total tasks count.
1. Investigate and fix the automation script to ensure that the 'ReproductionStep' object has the necessary attributes and methods to interact with browser elements.
2. Re-run the automation script after fixing the identified issues to verify if the bug can be successfully reproduced and to check if the total tasks count is displayed correctly.

The bug was not successfully reproduced due to a consistent automation error across all steps. The error message 'Browser automation error: 'ReproductionStep' object has no attribute 'get'' suggests that there is an issue with the automation script, specifically with the methods used to interact with the browser elements. This error prevented the automation from completing any of the steps, including verifying the total tasks count.
1. Investigate and fix the automation script to ensure that the 'ReproductionStep' object has the necessary attributes and methods to interact with browser elements.
2. Re-run the automation script after fixing the identified issues to verify if the bug can be successfully reproduced and to check if the total tasks count is displayed correctly.
